amendment.description: Amendment provided that veterans will be given priority when applying for SBIR and STTR awards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-603 to provide that veterans will be given priority when applying for SBIR and STTR awards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sutton amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Sutton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sutton amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
